about_the_game:
Castle Falkenstein – TimeLab DLC


In 1883, King Ludwig II of Bavaria, the visionary behind the famous Neuschwanstein Castle, conceived the idea for another building: Castle Falkenstein. Although this project was never realized, we bring his vision to life in a captivating virtual reconstruction.

Features:

  • Detailed Planning and Background Story: Based on the concrete designs of King Ludwig II, gain deep insights into the various development phases and the intriguing history of Castle Falkenstein.
  • Explore the Bedchamber: Discover the artistic ideas and sophisticated architecture embedded in the never-implemented plans of the Bavarian king. Every detail has been meticulously reconstructed to authentically represent the majestic vision.
  • Additional Game “Tower of Defense“: Test your skills and strategic abilities! The included game offers fun and challenges.
    Embark on a time travel journey and experience the majestic splendor of Castle Falkenstein as envisioned by King Ludwig II. This unique experience is a must for history enthusiasts and lovers of sophisticated architecture alike.

Available now on Steam!

Please Note: This DLC is compatible with our VR platform "TimeLab" also available on Steam.

  • OS: Windows 10 or later (x64)
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070
